column1: Smoque BBQ////I've been to Smoque's restaurant once and loved the experience.  Nothing fancy or flashy
column2: just meat cooked to perfection smokey perfection.  Again
column3: their BBQ is not smothered in BBQ sauce
column5: this may not be the place for you.  But if you love to drool over pure
column8: and moist meat (omg...that sounds so perverted...HA!) than give this place a go!
